nodes.text: The Clone Wars: Yoda's Missions is a children's activity book that ties into Star Wars: The Clone Wars. It was published in the UK and Australia on February 2, 2009.

Have you got what it takes to tackle Yoda's most challenging mission yet? Find out in this exciting activity book. Then, create your own Clone Wars adventures by dressing up as your favourite character and wearing the cool intergalactic tattoos from inside.
